snippet: To the Editor:    The continuing hearings sponsored by the San Francisco Commission on Animal Control and Welfare on live animal markets are redundant (front page, Aug. 26). It is illegal even now to sell live animals for human consumption in such...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: The continuing hearings sponsored by the San Francisco Commission on Animal Control and Welfare on live animal markets are redundant (front page, Aug. 26). It is illegal even now to sell live animals for human consumption in such places.
abstract: Eric Mills letter comments on Aug 26 article on sale of live animals for food by Chinese merchants in California (S)

headline.main: California Bans Selling Live Animals as Food
